tweet: .@bisq_network  got hacked and lost 3 BTC and 4000 XMR (~$250k) from 7 different victims.  https://t.co/06cphQmEOf

Bisq Statement on Critical Security Vulnerability  - 7 alleged victims had funds stolen - 3 bitcoin and 4000 XMR stolen - exploit patched in Bisq v1.3.0 ( https://t.co/X3HwC4bs5K) - proposal to repay the victims will be submitted to Bisq DAO   https://t.co/KJd6kdyoej
